      body#layout > * {border-radius:0.5rem;}  
      
      /* yz-settings */
      body#layout #yz-settings {background-color: #fde2e4;}

      /* header */
      body#layout header {}
      body#layout #top-header, body#layout #header, body#layout #yz-nav .section, body#layout #main-top, body#layout #top-blog,body#layout #main, body#layout #main-bottom, body#layout #main-bottom-2 { background-color: #eff7f6; }
      body#layout #header-label { margin-top: 11rem!important; }
      body#layout #header { float: left; width: 47%; display: block; }
      body#layout #yz-nav { float: right; width: 47%; display: block; }

      /* bottom header */
      body#layout #bottom-header {background-color: #e7f6e4;}

      /* main */
      body#layout #header-label {background: #edf2fb;}

      /* aside */
      body#layout aside {background-color: #fff1e6;}

      /* top-footer */
      body#layout #top-footer {background-color: #edf2fb;}

      /* footer */
      body#layout footer, body#layout #main-bottom-d, body#layout #youtube-sec {background-color: #dbd9eb;}

      /* ads */
      body#layout #HTML95 .widget-content, body#layout #HTML97 .widget-content, body#layout #HTML98 .widget-content { background-color: #daf5e8; }

      /* body script */
      body#layout #body-script {background: #e7f6e4;}
      
      body#layout #yz-settings h4:after, body#layout #main-top h4:after, body#layout #sidebar h4:after, body#layout #youtube-sec h4:after { content: ' - Reportal v.1.6.5 - yztheme.my.id'; padding-inline-start: 0.5rem; font-weight: 100; opacity: 0.65; font-style: italic; } 
      body#layout { margin: 0 auto; max-width: 1024px; display:block; background-color: transparent; border: none; }
      body#layout #main-top h4:after { content: ' - aktifkan hanya 1 (choose 1)'; }
      body#layout #sidebar h4:after { content: ' - sticky'; }
      body#layout #youtube-sec h4:after { content: ' - embed iframe youtube'; }
      main { max-width: 60%; display: inline-block!important; width: 60%; vertical-align: top; }
      aside { max-width: 30%; display: inline-block!important; vertical-align: top; }
      body#layout div.section { border: none !important; padding: 2.5rem 1rem 1rem 1rem !important; margin: 0 0px 16px !important; background: transparent; border-radius: 0.5rem; width: -moz-available;width: -webkit-fill-available; } 
      
      body#layout div.section h4 { position: absolute; top: 0.5rem; left: 0; } body#layout #yz-settings, body#layout #footer-nav, body#layout #footer-sec,body#layout #body-script, body#layout #top-header { display: flex!important; } body#layout #yz-settings .widget, body#layout #body-script .widget, body#layout #top-header .widget, body#layout .bottom-footer .footer > div { width: 33%; } 
      body#layout .bottom-footer .footer > .widget { display: block; min-width: 48%; }

      body#layout #yz-settings, body#layout header, body#layout #bottom-header, body#layout main, body#layout aside, body#layout #top-footer, body#layout footer, body#layout #body-script {margin:1rem!important;display: block;}

      body#layout #yz-settings .layout-widget-description, body#layout #body-script .layout-widget-description {display:none;} 
      
      
    
  
  
    
    
      
      /* Variable
      <Group description="Background Color" selector="body"> 
        <Variable name="bg_color" description="Background color app" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> 
        <Variable name="bg.color" description="Background" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> 
        <Variable name="bg.shade" description="Background shade" type="color" default="rgba(105, 105, 105, 0.15)" value="rgba(105, 105, 105, 0.1)"/> 
      </Group> 
      <Group description="Link Color" selector="body"> 
        <Variable name="link.color" description="Warna Link" type="color" default="#054cc3" value="#054cc3"/> 
      </Group> 

      <Group description="Dimensi (Desktop only)">
        <Variable name="body.width" description="Lebar Body" type="length" min="768px" max="1440px" default="1024px" value="1024px"/>
      </Group>
      <Group description="Color" selector="body"> 
        <Variable name="text.color" description="Warna Teks" type="color" default="#161d24" value="#161d24"/> 
        <Variable name="primary.color" description="Warna Link" type="color" default="#054cc3" value="#054cc3"/> 
      </Group> 
      Variable end */
      :root { 
        --bg-color: $(bg.color);
        --bg-card: $(bg.color); 
        --bg-shade: $(bg.shade); 
        --text-color: $(text.color); 
        --link-color: $(link.color); 
        --link-shade: rgba(5, 76, 195, .4); 
        --soft-line: var(--bg-shade); 
        --primary: #9f2b20; 
        --info: #334353; 
        --success: #708f49; 
        --warning: #ee7f11; 
        --danger: #f44336; 
        --webkit-bg-color: $(bg.color); 
        --webkit-bg-shade: $(bg.shade);
        --webkit-text-color: $(text.color);
        --webkit-link-color: $(link.color);
        --webkit-soft-line: var(--bg-shade);
        --skl-soft: #e6e6e6; 
        --skl-softer: #f0f0f0; 
        --skl-bold: #d6d6d6; 
        --skl-bolder: #c9c9c9;
      }
      
      :root[data-theme=dark] {
        --bg-color: $(text.color); 
        --bg-card: $(text.color); 
        --text-color: $(bg.color); 
        --link-color: #4f89ea; 
        --webkit-bg-color: $(text.color);
        --webkit-text-color: $(bg.color);
        --skl-soft: #202020; 
        --skl-softer: #303030; 
        --skl-bold: #d6d6d61a; 
        --skl-bolder: #c9c9c91a;
      }

      /* mobile */

      aside,header{padding:0 1rem}#header-label{font-size:.9rem;margin:0-1rem;padding:.25rem 1rem 0}#bottom-header>*,#masonry{padding:1rem}main{padding:1rem 1rem 0;gap:0}aside .items-more,aside .reload-button{top:1rem;right:1rem}#bottom-header .widget{margin:0}#main-bottom .widget:not(#main-bottom .widget:last-child){border-bottom:1rem solid var(--bg-shade);margin:0-1rem 1rem;padding:0 1rem 1rem}aside .widget:not(aside .widget:last-child){border-bottom:1rem solid var(--bg-shade);margin:0-1rem}main>div:not(main>div:first-child,main>div:last-child){border-bottom:1rem solid var(--bg-shade);margin:0-1rem;padding:0 1rem}#main-bottom .widget .items-more:not(#main-bottom .widget:last-child .items-more),#main-bottom .widget .reload-button:not(#main-bottom .widget:last-child .reload-button){right:1rem}.index main>div:last-child{border-bottom:1rem solid var(--bg-shade);margin:0-1rem;padding:1rem}main>:not(main>:last-child){margin:0 0 2rem}.inpost main>div{padding:0}.post-breadcrumb{margin-top:2rem}aside .widget:not(.widget .no-items),aside .widget:not(aside .widget:last-child){padding:1rem}aside .widget{padding:1rem;margin:0-1rem}#main-top .cont{margin:0-1rem;padding:0 1rem;gap:1rem;border-radius:0}#main-top .cont article{min-width:calc(100% - 3rem)!important}#main-top .cont .info{height:fit-content;padding:1rem;align-self:self-end;z-index:1;margin:-.5rem;margin-block-end:1.5rem}.scroll-buttons .pointer{display:none}.FeaturedPost{padding:0;border:0!important;margin-block-end:1rem;box-shadow:none}.FeaturedPost:after{right:0;top:.5rem}.index #Text21{margin-block-start:1rem}#main-bottom{gap:0;margin-top:1rem}#main-bottom-d,#youtube-sec{padding:1rem;margin:0-1rem}#youtube-sec .widget-content .lazy-iframe{max-width:-moz-available!important;max-width:-webkit-fill-available!important;flex:100%;height:auto;aspect-ratio:16/9;width:-webkit-fill-available;width:-moz-available}#youtube-sec .widget-content{flex-wrap:nowrap;overflow-x:auto}.swipe .items-more,.swipe .reload-button{right:1rem}.header .title-description{visibility:hidden;width:0;height:0}.coverImage{display:flex;flex-direction:column}.first-image{align-self:center;margin:2rem 0 0!important;width:134px;height:auto}.post-title{line-height:1.5}.lazy-iframe iframe{max-height:70vh}.readingTime{padding:0}[data-style=grid].random,[data-style=grid].recent{gap:2rem 4%}[data-style=grid] .items{flex:1 1 47%;max-width:48%;min-width:unset}[data-style=big] .items{flex:1 1 100%;max-width:100%}
      }
        
      /* displaynone */
      #HTML33 .title,#header-label .title,#yz-nav .title,.index .post-footer .byline>a:not(.post-footer .byline > a:last-child):after,.index .post-labels>:nth-child(n+2),.post-labels>:nth-child(n+2):not(.inpost .Blog .post-labels > :nth-child(n + 2)),.related-post .post-labels>:nth-child(n+2),.random .author-thumb, .recent .author-thumb, .scroll-buttons, .index #detailProduct img, .comment-replies .thread-show:checked+.comment-thread .thread-chrome,.comment-replies .thread-show:checked+.comment-thread+.comment-reply, #bottom-header .title, .modal, #body-script .title, 
      .comment-replies .thread-show:checked+.comment-thread .thread-toggle .showLess, 
      .comment-replies .thread-show:not(:checked)+.comment-thread .thread-toggle .showAll, .indicator-container:not(#main-top .indicator-container) {display:none} 
      
      @keyframes pulse { 75%, 100% { content: ""; -webkit-transform: scale(2); transform: scale(2); opacity: 0; } }
      @keyframes skeleton-loading { 0% { background-color: var(--skl-soft); } 100% { background-color: var(--skl-softer); } }
      @keyframes skeleton-top { 0% { background-color: var(--skl-bolder); } 100% { background-color: var(--skl-bold); } }
      @keyframes tickAnimation{ to{opacity:0} }

              /**/
var relatedTitles = [], relatedTitlesNum = 0, relatedUrls = [], relatedThumbnails = [];
    var currentPostUrl = window.location.href.replace(/\/$/, "").split("?")[0];
    function shuffleArrays(titles, urls, thumbnails) {
      for (let i = titles.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
        const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
        [titles[i], titles[j]] = [titles[j], titles[i]];
        [urls[i], urls[j]] = [urls[j], urls[i]];
        [thumbnails[i], thumbnails[j]] = [thumbnails[j], thumbnails[i]];
      }
      return { titles, urls, thumbnails };
    }
    function related_results_labels(e) {
      if (!e.feed || !e.feed.entry) {
        console.error("No related posts found.");
        return;
      }
      for (var t = 0; t < e.feed.entry.length; t++) {
        var r = e.feed.entry[t];
        var postUrl = "";
        for (var l = 0; l < r.link.length; l++) {
          if ("alternate" == r.link[l].rel) {
            postUrl = r.link[l].href.replace(/\/$/, "").split("?")[0];
            break;
          }
        }
        if (postUrl !== currentPostUrl) {
          relatedTitles[relatedTitlesNum] = r.title.$t;
          var a = r.media$thumbnail && r.media$thumbnail.url ? r.media$thumbnail.url : noImage;
          relatedThumbnails[relatedTitlesNum] = a;
          relatedUrls[relatedTitlesNum] = postUrl;
          relatedTitlesNum++;
        }
      }
      removeRelatedDuplicates();
      // Acak array setelah duplikat dihapus
      let shuffled = shuffleArrays(relatedTitles, relatedUrls, relatedThumbnails);
      relatedTitles = shuffled.titles;
      relatedUrls = shuffled.urls;
      relatedThumbnails = shuffled.thumbnails;
    }
    function removeRelatedDuplicates() {
      let unique = [...new Map(relatedUrls.map((url, i) => [url, { url, title: relatedTitles[i], thumb: relatedThumbnails[i] }])).values()];
      relatedUrls = unique.map(item => item.url);
      relatedTitles = unique.map(item => item.title);
      relatedThumbnails = unique.map(item => item.thumb);
    }
    function contains(e, t) {
      for (var r = 0; r < e.length; r++) {
        if (e[r] == t) return true;
      }
      return false;
    }
    function printRelatedLabels() {
      var e = midRelatedPostNum, t = Math.min(e, relatedTitles.length), r = [];
      for (var a = 0; a < t; a++) {
        var l = document.createElement("p");
        l.classList.add("relatedColumn", "card");
        var n = a, i = relatedTitles[n], d = relatedUrls[n], s = updateImageUrls(relatedThumbnails[n]);
        var u = document.createElement("img");
        u.setAttribute("src", s);
        u.setAttribute("alt", i);
        u.setAttribute("height", "72");
        u.setAttribute("width", "72");
        u.setAttribute("loading", "lazy");
        u.classList.add("relatedThumbnail");
        var m = document.createElement("span");
        m.classList.add("relatedText");
        m.innerText = midRelatedText;
        var h = document.createElement("a");
        h.setAttribute("href", d);
        h.setAttribute("target", "_blank");
        h.classList.add("max-line-1");
        h.innerText = i;
        l.appendChild(u);
        l.appendChild(m);
        l.appendChild(h);
        r.push(l);
      }
      return r;
    }
